column4: text
You embezzle $5000 from your company's petty cash fund
You ghost your therapist after they called you out on your bullshit
You start a pyramid scheme selling essential oils
You lie on your resume about having a master's degree
You steal your roommate's lunch from the office fridge
You become a cryptocurrency influencer promoting shitcoins
You fake a sick day to binge Netflix
You spread gossip about your ex on social media
You start dropshipping counterfeit designer goods
You take credit for your colleague's work in the meeting
